name: ez-publish
description: Command line tool for publishing js libraries

scripts.prepublish: npm run lint && npm run dist && node ./ez-publish.js
scripts.test: npm run dist && rm -rf _debugging; git clone git@github.com:ez-tools/_debugging.git && node ./ez-publish.js publish _debugging -s patch

author: Kevin Jahns <kevin.jahns@rwth-aachen.de>
